pages.title: A Different Physiology
pages.text: With Metabolic Override active, exhaustion is constantly reset to $(2)zero$().$(br2)You will never lose hunger from sprinting or environmental fatigue.

pages.title: Custom Regeneration
pages.text: Healing occurs periodically and consumes $(e)Saturation$() first.$(br)If saturation is empty, $(c)Hunger$() is consumed instead.$(br2)This prevents infinite regeneration without eating.

pages.title: Strategic Use
pages.text: This charm is powerful for combat and exploration.$(br2)However, food management becomes critical.$(br)Running out of food removes your ability to recover health.
